titles.title: A resolution acknowledging the severity of the wetland loss occurring in Louisiana and supporting the observance of World Wetlands Day in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 2/6/2007--Introduced. Acknowledges the severity of the wetland loss occurring in Louisiana. Supports: (1) observance of World Wetlands Day in the United States; and (2) efforts to raise awareness about the critical need to preserve wetlands in Louisiana, the United States, and throughout the world.
